overview.en: DADA is a DAO aggregator built for blockchain project founders and investors, to unlock abundant capital flow safely and transparently and profit from the investments. Users co-governs the community and select the projects they want to participate; fund managers launch or lock their projects using smart contracts. The decentralized platform makes investment information transparent, which lowers the risk for investors.
overview.zh: DADA致力于建设一站式的去中心化DAO，DADA基于用户在区块链行业的投资需求和偏好，为其提供数字化、自动化、智能化的技术与平台支持， DADA矿业生态聚合器作为区块链中的平台层，用户可通过社区自治来选择想要参与的项目，基金经理可以通过智能合约发布和锁定自己的项目，同时通过DADA提供的完全去中心化的交易体验将所有流转信息公开透明、分散风险，让普通用户参与DAO无后顾之忧。
